text: Conseil d'État, France Pierre Alexandre Joseph Allent (1772–1837) was a French général de division (major general). He served in the Chamber of Deputies under the Bourbon Restoration and in the Chamber of Peers under the July Monarchy. He was a knight of the Order of Saint Louis and a commander of the Legion of Honour. ==References== Category:1772 births Category:1837 deaths Category:Members of the Chamber of Peers of the July Monarchy Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies of the Bourbon Restoration Category:Knights of the Order of Saint Louis Category:Commandeurs of the Légion d'honneur Category:Place of birth missing
title: Pierre Alexandre Joseph Allent
